entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as having the worst memory.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is introduced as a character who is looking displeased and trying to get information from Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation with Umbridge.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is mentioned as a criminal who was meeting Harry and was almost caught by Umbridge.

relationships.description: Umbridge almost caught Sirius Black in the Gryffindor fire.
Umbridge knows that Harry was meeting Sirius Black.
Snape has a memory issue, which is mentioned as his worst memory.
